FreeInputExplain: Y您可複製&貼上任何文字內容例如寶可夢名稱, 經緯度等條件, bot將會分析文字內容進行狙擊
EvolveConfirm: 這個寶可夢可進化成以下寶可夢, 請選擇你要進化成哪個
PowerUpDescription: 你要強化嗎? 正常強化是進行 x 次強化. 最大強化是以所有的糖果與星塵與玩家等級盡可能強化到最高
Setting.ConsoleConfig.TranslationLanguag: 語言代碼設定 (範例: en = 英文, zh-TW = 繁中)
Setting.ConsoleConfig.StartupWelcomeDela: 若開啟, 將會在啟動時顯示歡迎畫面
Setting.ConsoleConfig.AmountOfPokemonToD: 啟動時顯示寶可夢數量
Setting.ConsoleConfig.DetailedCountsBefo: 顯示詳細物品拋棄數量
Setting.UpdateConfigDesc: 設定機器人啟動前自動檢查更新程式
Setting.UpdateConfig.SchemaVersionDesc: 讓機器人自動檢查最新版本, 並在有新版時於命令窗提示
Setting.UpdateConfig.CheckForUpdatesDesc: 將機器人自動更新至最新版本
Setting.WebsocketsConfigDesc: 設定要讓圖形化介面使用的web socket.
Setting.WebsocketsConfig.UseWebsocketDes: 允許圖形化介面經由web socket連接機器人
Setting.WebsocketsConfig.WebSocketPortDe: 指定web socket port. 你必須同時在圖形化介面裡指定這個port與相鄰port
Setting.LocationConfigDesc: 指定機器人啟動的地點.
Setting.LocationConfig.DisableHumanWalki: 當關閉時, 機器人將會以瞬間移動取代仿人行走, 不建議關閉
Setting.LocationConfig.StartFromLastPosi: 當打開時, 機器人將從最後離線點啟動而非預設啟動點
Setting.LocationConfig.WalkingSpeedInKil: 機器人移動於補給站之間的速度KM/h
Setting.LocationConfig.UseWalkingSpeedVa: 打開此選項可加入隨機移動速度變化
Setting.LocationConfig.WalkingSpeedVaria: 當移動速度變化打開時, 加入移動速度變化量
Setting.LocationConfig.ShowVariantWalkin: 於命令窗顯示移動速度變化量
Setting.LocationConfig.RandomlyPauseAtSt: 當打開時, 機器人將在補給站隨機暫停, 讓機器人更像真人
Setting.LocationConfig.MaxSpawnLocationO: 最大預設登入點偏移量
Set random offset change when bot starts from default location
Setting.LocationConfig.MaxTravelDistance: The radius distance for bot to travel from default location. Notice that this may be changed depending on other configs, as bot may walk out of that radius
Setting.TelegramConfigDesc: Setting up Telegram API to allow control bot from Telegram .
Setting.TelegramConfig.UseTelegramAPIDes: Allows control of bot from Telegram commands
Setting.TelegramConfig.TelegramAPIKeyDes: Telegram API Key that's required for communication
Setting.GPXConfig.UseGpxPathingDesc: If this option is turned on, the bot will walk using the predifined path in GpxFile
Setting.GPXConfig.GpxFileDesc: The GPX file name or full path. if you not enter full path, you have to copy the file into bot directory
Setting.SnipeConfig.UseSnipeLocationServ: Tell bot to use location service, detail at - https://github.com/5andr0/PogoLocationFeeder
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipeLocationServerD: IP Address or server name of location server, usually this is localhost or 127.0.0.1
Setting.SnipeConfig.MinPokeballsToSnipeD: Number of balls in inventory to get sniper function to work.
Setting.SnipeConfig.MinPokeballsWhileSni: Min balls allowed to exist sniper
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipingScanOffsetDes: The area bot try to scan for target pokemon.
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipeAtPokestopsDesc: That setting will make bot snipe when it reaches every pokestop.
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipeIgnoreUnknownIv: Turn this on to ignore pokemon with unknown IV from data source
Setting.SnipeConfig.UseTransferIvForSnip: Bot will transfer pokemon for sniping if the sniping pokemon is of a higher IV than this.
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipePokemonNotInPok: Turn this on it for bot only by priority to snipe pokemon not in pokedex.
Setting.SnipeConfig.UseSnipeLimitDesc: Turn this on to limit the speed for sniping.
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipeCountLimitDesc: Limits number of snipe in hour.
Setting.SnipeConfig.MinIVForAutoSnipeDes: Min IV that the bot will automatically snipe pokemon
Setting.SnipeConfig.MinLevelForAutoSnipe: Min Level that the bot will automatically snipe pokemon
Setting.SnipeConfig.AutosnipeVerifiedOnl: Only auto snipe pokemon that have been verified (overwriteable by invidual pokemon)
Setting.SnipeConfig.DefaultAutoSnipeCand: Set the amount of candy you want bot to auto snipe if it has less candy than this value.
Setting.SnipeConfig.SnipePauseOnOutOfBal: Total time in minutes bot will ignore auto snipe when out of pokeballs
Setting.SnipeConfig.AutoSnipeMaxDistance: Max distance in km that will allow bot to auto snipe.
Setting.SnipeConfig.AutoSnipeBatchSizeDe: Number of auto snipe on a pokemon in a row that bot pickup for snipe
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfigDesc: Setting up option for human walk snipe.
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.EnableDesc: Allow bot using human walk sniper feature
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.DisplayPoke: Display list pokemon snipeable in console window
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.MaxDistance: Max distance that you want bot travel for snipe
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.MaxEstimate: Max walking time you want bot travel to snipe
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.CatchEmAllM: Minimun ball available in bag for catch em all mode. this mean continuously snipping if pokemon available.
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.TryCatchEmA: Try to catch em all - confused
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.CatchPokemo: Allow catch pokemon when walking to target - overwrite by pokemon filter
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.SpinWhileWa: Allow farm pokestop when walking to target - overwrite by pokemon filter
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.AlwaysWalkb: Set to make bot return to farm zone define in MaxTravelDistance in location config
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.SnipingScan: The area the bot looking for pokemon from data service.
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.WalkbackDis: The max distance bot will always walk back regardless AlwaysWalkback
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.IncludeDefa: Turn it on will always looking for pokemon at default location no matter what how far from current location
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.UseSnipePok: Use list pokemon pokemon to snipe
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.MaxSpeedUpS: The maximun speed up that bot travel when snipe - overwrite by pokemon setting
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.AllowSpeedU: Allow bot speed up for snipe with the max speed defined above - overwrite by pokemon setting
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.DelayTimeAt: Milisecond delay time at destination before looking for pokemon - overwrite by pokemon setting
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeConfig.AllowTransf: Allow bot transfer while working to target  - overriteable
Setting.DataSharingConfig.EnableSyncData: ALlow bot send pokemon data to share data serice
Setting.DataSharingConfig.AutoSnipeDesc: Allows bot to auto snipe pokemon whenever it has feed sent back from server
Setting.DataSharingConfig.DataServiceIde: A unique ID you make by yourself to do a manual snipe from mypogosnipers.com. You have to make sure it is unique
Setting.DataSharingConfig.SnipeDataAcces: The authorized access key to use snipe data
Setting.DataSharingConfig.FailoverDataSe: List of servers that bot will connect to when primary server is down or can't be connected to
Setting.PokeStopConfig.UsePokeStopLimitD: Allows bot to check for pokestop daily limit - PokeStopLimit per PokeStopLimitMinutes
Setting.PokeStopConfig.PokeStopLimitDesc: Max number of pokestops bot is allowed to farm a day
Setting.PokeStopConfig.PokeStopLimitMinu: Time duration apply for the limit above in minutes
Setting.GymConfigDesc: Setting up for gym and battle.
Setting.GymConfig.EnableDesc: Allows bot go to a gym for training, defense or battle with other teams.
Setting.GymConfig.PrioritizeGymOverPokes: If Enabled, bot will select a gym to go to instead of a pokestop if gym distance is valid
Setting.GymConfig.MaxDistanceDesc: Maximum distance bot is allowed to walk to a gym.
Setting.GymConfig.DefaultTeamDesc: Default team color for bot to join.
Setting.GymConfig.MaxCPToDeployDesc: Max CP that pokemon will be selected for defending gyms.
Setting.GymConfig.MaxLevelToDeployDesc: Max LV of pokemon that can be put into a gym.
Setting.GymConfig.VisitTimeoutDesc: Time in minutes to visit, come back, and check gym, depending on distance setting
Setting.GymConfig.NumberOfTopPokemonToBe: Top Number pokemon by CP to exclude from pokemon deploying in gyms.
Setting.GymConfig.CollectCoinAfterDeploy: Collect coins after gym has been deployed
Setting.GymConfig.HealDefendersBeforeApp: Heal defenders before applying to gym
Setting.GymConfig.DontAttackAfterCoinsLi: Don't Attack Gyms After Coins Limit is Reached
Setting.GymConfig.TrainGymWhenMissingMax: Train in gyms even when missing maximum points
Setting.GymConfig.TrainAlreadyDefendedGy: Train in an already defended gym
Setting.GymConfig.MinCpToUseInAttackDesc: Min CP pokemon to use in attacking gyms
Setting.GymConfig.ButNotLessThanDefender: But not less than defender's percent
Setting.GymConfig.UsePokemonToAttackOnly: Use Pokemon to attack only by their CP
Setting.GymConfig.ExcludeForGymsDesc: List of pokemon that bot won't use in gym battles or deploys
Setting.GymConfig.DontUseDodgeDesc: Do not use dodge in gyms
Setting.GymConfig.MinRevivePotionsDesc: Minimum revive potions to use gym module
Setting.GymConfig.MaxTrainingRoundsOnOne: Max Training Rounds in a gym
Setting.GymConfig.DefendersDesc: List of Defenders to use for Gyms
Setting.GymConfig.AttackersDesc: List of Attackers to use for Gyms
Setting.GymConfig.TrainersDesc: List of Trainers to use for Gyms
Setting.PokemonConfigDesc: Setting up for pokemon catching, evolve, transfer, upgrade.
Setting.PokemonConfig.DelayBetweenPokemo: Delay time between time catching pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseCatchLimitDesc: Check for daily limit catch rate - CatchPokemonLimit per CatchPokemonLimitMinutes
Setting.PokemonConfig.CatchPokemonLimitD: Number of pokemon allowed for catch duration
Setting.PokemonConfig.CatchPokemonLimitM: Catch duration applied for catch limit & number
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseEggIncubatorsDe: Allows bot to put an egg in an Incubator for hatching
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseLimitedEggIncub: When Enabled, bot will only put 10km egg into a non-infinity incubator
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseLuckyEggsMinPok: Number of Pokemon ready for evolve that can and are able to use lucky egg
Setting.PokemonConfig.TransferDuplicateP: Allows bot to transfer all duplicate pokemon
Allows bot to transfer duplicated pokemon right after catch
Setting.PokemonConfig.FavoriteMinIvPerce: Set min IV for auto favoriting pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.MaxPokeballsPerPok: Number of balls that will be used to catch a pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseGreatBallAboveC: Min CP for using Great Ball instead of PokeBall
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseUltraBallAboveC: Min CP for using Ultra Ball instead of Great Ball
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseMasterBallAbove: Min CP for using Master Ball instead of Ultra Ball
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseGreatBallAboveI: Min IV for using Great Ball instead of PokeBall
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseUltraBallAboveI: Min CP for using Ultra Ball instead of Great Ball
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseGreatBallBelowC: Min catch probability for using Ultra Ball instead of PokeBall
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseUltraBallBelowC: Min catch probability for using Ultra Ball instead of Great Ball
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseMasterBallBelow: Min catch probability for using Master Ball instead of Ultra Ball
Setting.PokemonConfig.OnlyUpgradeFavorit: Only allow the bot to upgrade favorited pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseLevelUpListDesc: Use level up on this list of pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.AmountOfTimesToUpg: Number of times to upgrade a Pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.GetMinStarDustForL: Min stardust to keep for auto power up
Setting.PokemonConfig.LevelUpByCPorIvDes: Select pokemon to powerup by IV or CP
Setting.PokemonConfig.UpgradePokemonMini: Logic operator for selecting pokemon for upgrade
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveAboveIvValue: Specify min IV for evolving pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveAllPokemonWi: When enabled, bot will evolve pokemon when it has enough candy
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveKeptPokemons: Specify the max storage pokemon bag for triggering evolve
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMinCpDesc: Specify min CP to not transfer pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMinIvPercentag: Specify min IV to not transfer pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMinLvlDesc: Specify min LV to not transfer pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMinOperatorDes: Logic operator for keep pokemon check
Setting.PokemonConfig.PrioritizeIvOverCp: Keep pokemon has higher IV then CP to not transfer pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMinDuplicatePo: Min number of duplicated pokemon to keep
Setting.PokemonConfig.KeepMaxDuplicatePo: Max number of duplicated pokemon to keep
Setting.PokemonConfig.UsePokemonToNotCat: Use the list pokemon not catch filter
Setting.PokemonConfig.UsePokemonToCatchL: Use the Pokemon To Catch Local List
Setting.PokemonConfig.OutOfBallCatchBloc: Temporarily disable catching pokemon for certain minutes if bot runs out of balls
Setting.PokemonConfig.PokeballToKeepForS: Number of balls you want to save for snipe or manual play - it means if total balls is less than this value, catch pokemon will be deactivated
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseBulkTransferPok: Transfer multiple pokemon at once - this will increase bot speed and reduce api call
Setting.PokemonConfig.BulkTransferStogar: Bot will transfer pokemons only when MaxStogare < pokemon + buffer
Setting.PokemonConfig.BulkTransferSizeDe: Maximun number of pokemon in a transfer
Setting.PokemonConfig.UseBallOperatorDes: Use ball operator between IV and CP
Setting.PokemonConfig.FavoriteMinCpDesc: Set min CP for auto favoriting pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.FavoriteOperatorDe: The logic operator to check compbo IV, CP, Level to favorite pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.RenamePokemonRespe: If Enabled, bot will only rename pokemon not meeting transfer settings, otherwise, the bot will rename all pokemon in bag
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveFavoritedOnl: Global settting - Allows bot to only evolve favorited pokemons
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveOperatorDesc: The logic check to evolve pokemon
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveMinIVDesc: Set Min IV for bot to evolve
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveMinCPDesc: Set Min CP for bot to evolve
Setting.PokemonConfig.EvolveMinLevelDesc: Set Min Level for bot to evolve
Setting.PokemonConfig.ByPassCatchFleeDes: Allows bot to bypass catchflee - not recommended to use this feature
Setting.RecycleConfig.VerboseRecyclingDe: Allows bot to display lists of items to be recycled
Setting.RecycleConfig.RecycleInventoryAt: Specify percentage of inventory full to start recycle
Setting.RecycleConfig.RandomRecycleValue: Number of randomized items to be recycled
Setting.RecycleConfig.TotalAmountOfPokeb: How many pokeballs (normal, great, ultra) to be kept
Setting.RecycleConfig.TotalAmountOfPotio: How many potions (normal, hyper, ultra, max) to be kept
Setting.RecycleConfig.TotalAmountOfReviv: How many revives (normal, max) to be kept
Setting.RecycleConfig.TotalAmountOfBerri: How many berries to be kept
Setting.RecycleConfig.UseRecyclePercents: Use recycle percents instead of totals (for example PercentOfInventoryPokeballsToKeep instead of TotalAmountOfPokeballsToKeep)
Setting.RecycleConfig.PercentOfInventory: How many pokeballs (normal, great, ultra) to be kept as a percent of inventory
How many potions (normal, hyper, ultra, max) to be kept as a percent of inventory
How many revives (normal, max) to be kept as a percent of inventory
How many berries to be kept as a percent of inventory
Setting.CustomCatchConfigDesc: Setting up for some custom parametter for catching.
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.EnableHumanize: Allows bot to simulate throws as humanlike as possible
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.EnableMissedTh: Allow bot throws to miss pokemon
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ThrowMissPerce: Set percentage for how many pokemon bot can miss
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.NiceThrowChanc: Set percentage for how many bot can throw balls with nice hits
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.GreatThrowChan: Set percentage for how many bot can throw balls with great hits
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ExcellentThrow: Set percentage for how many bot can throw balls with excellent hits
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.CurveThrowChan: Set percentage for how many bot can throw balls with curve hits
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ForceGreatThro: Forces bot to get a great throw if IV is higher than this value
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ForceExcellent: Forces bot to get a excellent throw if IV is higher than this value
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ForceGreatThro: Forces bot to get a great throw if CP higher than this value
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.ForceExcellent: Forces bot to get an excellent throw if CP higher than this value
Setting.CustomCatchConfig.UseTransferFil: Allow bot use transfer filter to catch pokemon -
Setting.PlayerConfigDesc: Setting up for some custom parametter for bot perfom user action.
Setting.PlayerConfig.EvolveActionDelayDe: Sets delay time for evolve actions
Setting.PlayerConfig.TransferActionDelay: Sets delay time for transfer actions
Setting.PlayerConfig.RecycleActionDelayD: Sets delay time for recycling items
Setting.PlayerConfig.RenamePokemonAction: Sets delay time for renaming pokemon actions
Setting.PlayerConfig.UseNearActionRandom: Sets delay time for random actions
Setting.PlayerConfig.AutoFinishTutorialD: Auto Complete first time experience tutorial (Bot will try to use your ptc username or firstpart of email as username)
Setting.SoftBanConfig.FastSoftBanBypassD: Allows bot to resolve softbans automatically
Setting.GoogleWalkConfigDesc: Setup parametter for google walk such as api key, account, rules..
Setting.GoogleWalkConfig.UseGoogleWalkDe: Use Google's API to resolve paths for destinations
Setting.GoogleWalkConfig.DefaultStepLeng: Set step length in met for 1 step
Setting.GoogleWalkConfig.GoogleHeuristic: Set heuristic for Google's Algorithm Detection - driving, walking, bicycling, transit
Setting.GoogleWalkConfig.GoogleAPIKeyDes: API Key to be used to connect to Google's API Service
Setting.GoogleWalkConfig.GoogleElevation: API key to be used to connect to Google's Elevation API Service (Not the Same as Google API Key)
Setting.YoursWalkConfigDesc: Setup parametter for YoursWalkConfig walk such as api key, account, rules..
Setting.YoursWalkConfig.UseYoursWalkDesc: Use your walk api to resolve path for bot moving
Setting.YoursWalkConfig.YoursWalkHeurist: Set heuricstic for moving: motorcar, bicycle, foot..
Setting.MapzenWalkConfigDesc: Setup parametter for MapzenWalkConfig walk such as api key, account, rules..
Setting.MapzenWalkConfig.UseMapzenWalkDe: Allows bot to use Mapzen API to resolve path
Setting.MapzenWalkConfig.MapzenTurnByTur: API Key used to connect to Mapzen Services
Setting.MapzenWalkConfig.MapzenWalkHeuri: Set the heuristic to find routes
Setting.MapzenWalkConfig.MapzenElevation: API Key used to connect to Mapzen API Elevation Services
Setting.ItemRecycleFilterDesc: Set number of each item we want bot to keep when it perfom recycle for get free space
Setting.CaptchaConfigDesc: Captcha config to define the way you prefer to resolve captcha
Setting.CaptchaConfig.AllowManualCaptcha: Display captchas on browser and allow resolving manually
Setting.CaptchaConfig.ManualCaptchaTimeo: Number of seconds bot will wait for you to resolve captcha, if after the time set and captcha havent resolved yet, the bot will continue
Setting.CaptchaConfig.PlaySoundOnCaptcha: Play an alert sound when you receive a captcha
Setting.CaptchaConfig.DisplayOnTopDesc: Display captchas on top of your screen
Setting.CaptchaConfig.AutoCaptchaRetries: Number of times bot will try to resolve captchas automatically
Setting.CaptchaConfig.EnableAntiCaptchaD: Enable Auto captcha solving with Anti-Captcha
Setting.CaptchaConfig.ProxyHostDesc: Proxy host to be used by captcha service
Setting.CaptchaConfig.ProxyPortDesc: Proxy port to be used by captcha service
Setting.CaptchaConfig.EnableCaptchaSolut: Enable Auto captcha solving with CaptchaSolutions.com
Setting.CaptchaConfig.CaptchaSolutionsSe: Secret Key to use for CaptchaSolutions
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.AllowTran: If Enabled, bot will transfer this type of pokemon when matched with filter condition.
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.DoNotTran: If Enabled, Bot won't transfer this pokemon. If Not, Bot will use other parameters to check.
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMinCp: Pokemon with CP lower than this value will be transfered
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMinIv: Pokemon with IV lower than this value will be transfered
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMinLv: Pokemon with LV lower than this value will be transfered
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMinOp: The operator logic use to check for transfer
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMinDu: Min number of duplication pokemon to keep
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.KeepMaxDu: Max number of duplication pokemon to keep
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.MovesDesc: Defined unwanted moves, and pokemon that have this move will be transfered
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.CatchOnly: Turn on this option to allow bot to catch only good pokemon with not meet transfer condition.
Setting.PokemonsTransferFilter.AffectToP: Define the list of pokemon which this setting will affect
Setting.ItemUseFiltersDesc: Define logic to use item when catching Pokemon
Setting.ItemUseFilters.UseItemMinIVDesc: Min IV needed to use this item
Setting.ItemUseFilters.UseItemMinLevelDe: Min LV needed to use this item
Setting.ItemUseFilters.UseItemMinCPDesc: Min CP needed to use this item
Setting.ItemUseFilters.OperatorDesc: The operator logic use to check for using the item
Setting.ItemUseFilters.CatchProbabilityD: Catch Probability when using this Item
Setting.ItemUseFilters.PokemonsDesc: Define list of pokemon to apply these berries, empty to allow all
Setting.ItemUseFilters.MaxItemsUsePerPok: Define how many items will be used for the same pokemon
Setting.ItemUseFilters.UseIfExceedBagRec: If your items exceed the recycle filter, it will always use this when possible
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFiltersDesc: Setting up human walk snipe filter by pokemon
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.AllowSnipe: Allows bot to snipe this pokemon
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.MaxDistanc: Max distance that bot is allowed to walk to snipe this pokemon
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.PriorityDe: Priority for this pokemon compared to others
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.MaxWalkTim: Max walk time for bot to catch this pokemon compared to others
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.CatchPokem: Allows bot to catch pokemon while it walking to snipe target
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.SpinPokest: Allows bot spin pokestops while it's walking to snipe target
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.MaxSpeedUp: The max speed up to apply while walking to this pokemon
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.AllowSpeed: Allows bot to speed up to catch this pokemon
Setting.HumanWalkSnipeFilters.AllowTrans: Allows bot to transfer pokemon while it's walking to target
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFiltersDesc: Setting up pokemon filter for level up
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFilters.AllowTrans: If enabled, will allow custom filter for level up
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFilters.UpgradePok: Operator logic to check pokemon for upgrade
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFilters.OnlyUpgrad: If Enabled, Bot will only upgrade pokemon that are favorited only, and it will ignore all those condition check.
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFilters.MovesDesc: Only update if move set match with pair in the list
Setting.PokemonUpgradeFilters.AffectToPo: Define list of pokemon that this upgrade filter will also be applied to
Setting.MultipleBotConfigDesc: Setting up bot to use multiple account
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.RuntimeSwitchD: Bot will switch to new account after this many minutes
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.RuntimeSwitchR: Add +-this or anything between to the RuntimeSwitch
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.OnLimitPauseTi: This many minutes to block this bot when reaching the daily limit
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.OnRarePokemonD: Allows bot to switch account when encountering a rare pokemon that you've definied in the list
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.MinIVToSwitchD: Allows bot to switch account when encountering a pokemon IV higher than this value
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.EXPSwitchDesc: Bot will switch to a new account after collecting this much EXP in a session
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.PokestopSwitch: Bot will switch to a new account after this many pokestops are farmed
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.PokemonSwitchD: Bot will switch to a new account after this many pokemon are caught
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.PokemonPerHour: Bot will switch to a new account after this many pokemon are caught in 1 hours - not being used atm
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.StartFromDefau: Tell bot to start at default location
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.PokestopSoftba: How many times pokestop softban can triger bot switch, 0 means it doesn't switch
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.DisplayListDes: Displays bot list (include ran time) on switch
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.SelectAccountO: Bot will display a list of accounts that you have setup in auth.json then ask you to select which account you want to start with.
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.CatchFleeCount: Number of continuously catch flees before switching account
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.SwitchOnCatchL: Switch account on meeting catch limit
Setting.MultipleBotConfig.SwitchOnPokest: Switch account on meeting pokestop limit
Setting.NotificationConfig.PushBulletApi: API Key to connect to pushbullet (Go to pushbullet.com to get a key)
Setting.NotificationConfig.GmailUsername: Gmail Address to send emails to
Setting.NotificationConfig.RecipientsDes: List of email addresses allowed to recieve notificaitons
Setting.SnipePokemonFilterDesc: Setup list pokemon for auto snipe
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.EnableSnipeDe: Enables bot Snipe filter, if not it will use global setting
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.SnipeIVDesc: Min Pokemon IV for auto sniping
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.MovesDesc: Defines list of moves that you want snipe
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.OperatorDesc: Operator logic check between move and IV
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.VerifiedOnlyD: Only catch pokemon that have been verified
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.AutoSnipeCand: Set number of candy you want bot to snipe for this pokemon
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.LevelDesc: Min level to snipe, level are using and logic with IV and move and only activate for verify data
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.AllowMultiAcc: Allows bot to change account to snipe this pokemon
Setting.SnipePokemonFilter.AffectToPokem: Defines list of pokemon using this filter too
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilterDesc: Setup list pokemon for auto evolve
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.MinCPDesc: Min CP allowed to auto evolve
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.MovesDesc: List of desired moves for evolving
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.OperatorDesc: The operator logic use to check for evolve
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.EvolveToDesc: Select branch to envolve to for multiple branch pokemon like Poliwirl
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.AffectToPoke: Sets the list of pokemon you want to use the same config for
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.FavoritedOnl: If true, bot will only evolve pokemon that are favorited
Setting.PokemonEvolveFilter.MinCandiesBe: If greater than 0, bot will not evolve right away, but instead keep transferring pokemon to save up at least min candies required by this value before evolving.
Setting.CatchPokemonFilter.EnableCatchFi: Allows bot to check for filter for catching specific pokemon(s)
Setting.CatchPokemonFilter.MinLVDesc: Min LV for auto catching pokemon
Setting.CatchPokemonFilter.MinCPDesc: Min CP for auto catching pokemon
Setting.CatchPokemonFilter.MovesDesc: List of desired moves for catching pokemon
Setting.CatchPokemonFilter.OperatorDesc: The operator logic use to check for catch
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFiltersDesc: Define the filter to switch bot in multiple account mode.
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.AllowBot: Allows bot to use invidual filters for switching accounts
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.IVDesc: When this pokemon has a IV > this value, the bot will switch accounts
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.LVDesc: When this pokemon has a LV > this value, the bot will switch accounts
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.MovesDes: When a wild pokemon has the move match, the bot will switch accounts to catch
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.RemainTi: Number of seconds since pokemon disappeared
Setting.BotSwitchPokemonFilters.AffectTo: List of same pokemon to apply to this filter
Setting.UIConfigDesc: Define all parametter to display data on UI.
Setting.UIConfig.SnipeItemListDisplayTim: The number of seconds that the bot will display auto snipe data
Setting.UIConfig.SnipeListRefreshInterva: Interval to refresh auto snipe data
Setting.HumanlikeDelaysDesc: Define the delays for humanlike behaviour when catching pokemon
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.UseHumanlikeDela: Enables the usage of Human-Like Delays
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.CatchSuccessDela: Sets delay time when a catch is successfull
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.CatchErrorDelayD: Sets delay time when a catch is error
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.CatchEscapeDelay: Sets delay time when a catch escapes
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.CatchFleeDelayDe: Sets delay time when a catch flees
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.CatchMissedDelay: Sets delay time when a catch is missed
Setting.HumanlikeDelays.BeforeCatchDelay: Sets delay time when throwing the ball before catch
